      Tolerance getInstance(java.lang.String _spec, Units _unit)
      Creates instances from strings in any of these formats (where "n" or "m" is any well-formed number):
      n%
      +-n%
      +n-m%
      n-m%
      -n+m%
      Units are ignored.
